VI.ii.4.B.6.b
.
Removal From the TDRL of a Veteran in Receipt of VA Benefits
If an RPC provides notice that a Veteran in receipt of compensation is no longer receiving MRP, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 4.B.1.d
for removing the retired pay indicator from the corporate record.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Preparing and Adjusting Awards in Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases
